serviceBlocks.title: Our Services
serviceBlocks.description: We offer professional services for all your business needs.

manpowerSupply.title: Manpower Supply
manpowerSupply.description: We specialize in delivering skilled and semi-skilled labor to meet diverse operational needs: Packaging & Wrapping Workers, Loading & Unloading Labor, Excavation & Demolition Teams, Cleaning & Facility Workers, Specialized Labor for Industrial Operations

vehicleLeasing.title: Vehicle Leasing & Transport Solutions
vehicleLeasing.description: Our extensive fleet ensures safe and flexible transport for both goods and people: Heavy Trucks & Trailers (Jumbo, Dabbaba, etc.), Vans & Pickup Trucks, Buses & Microbuses, Private Cars for Corporate Use

carRental.title: Car Rental
carRental.description: We provide a comprehensive car rental service including Vans, Sedans, Buses, and Microbuses to meet your transportation needs for both business operations and corporate events.

transportVehicles.title: Transport Vehicles Supply
transportVehicles.description: Our supply of transport vehicles includes Pickups, Jumbo Trucks, and Trailers to support your logistics and transportation needs for moving goods efficiently and reliably.

packagingLabor.title: Packaging Labor Supply
packagingLabor.description: We provide skilled packaging labor to ensure your products are properly wrapped, boxed, and prepared for shipping with attention to detail and efficiency to maintain your production schedule.

loadingLabor.title: Loading & Unloading Labor
loadingLabor.description: Our loading and unloading labor team is trained to handle goods of all sizes safely and efficiently, ensuring timely loading and unloading of trucks, containers, and warehouses.

cleaningLabor.title: Housekeeping & Cleaning Labor
cleaningLabor.description: Our professional housekeeping and cleaning staff maintain hygienic and organized workspaces, including offices, industrial facilities, and commercial properties to ensure a clean environment.

demolitionLabor.title: Demolition & Excavation Labor
demolitionLabor.description: Our skilled demolition and excavation teams handle all aspects of site preparation, building removal, and earthmoving projects with a focus on safety, efficiency, and proper debris management.

carMaintenance.title: Car Maintenance & Repair
carMaintenance.description: We provide reliable maintenance and repair solutions to keep vehicles and fleets in excellent condition, minimizing downtime and maximizing efficiency for all your business transportation needs.

spareParts.title: Spare Parts Supply
spareParts.description: We supply high-quality spare parts, both imported and new, for various vehicle makes and models, ensuring that your fleet remains operational with minimal downtime.

cleaningSupplies.title: Cleaning Supplies
cleaningSupplies.description: We offer a comprehensive range of industrial cleaning supplies, including detergents, sanitizers, equipment, and materials to maintain hygienic environments across all types of facilities.

cateringSupplies.title: Catering & Pantry Supplies
cateringSupplies.description: We provide a wide range of catering and pantry supplies for office kitchens, cafeterias, and staff rooms, from disposable items to appliances, ensuring your facility has everything needed for meal preparation and service.

footer.address: Building 2 – Office 4 – Bietcho Towers - Maadi – Cairo, Egypt
